title: Farrukh greets MLA Niazi on his nomination as AJK PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 04 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib in a tweet on Wednesday extended his best wishes to the newly elected Member of Legislative Assembly (MLA) Abdul Qayyum Niazi on his nomination as the Prime Minister of Azad Jammu and Kashmir.
Good luck Abdul Qayyum Niazi #PMAJK https://t.co/P0fKAHg7Bu pic.twitter.com/aMJ2rmvKts
â€” Farrukh Habib (@FarrukhHabibISF) August 4, 2021
